message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay that much for the product.

I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value of this product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product, and I think that's a fair price considering the value it provides.

I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell it to you for $115. It's the best I can do, and I think it's still a great deal for you.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product, and I think that's the best I can do. I'm really interested in getting this product, but I need to stay within my budget.
